basic.description: An advanced, problem-based course focusing on current approaches to the study of mechanisms of chemical toxicity.  Winter; 3 hour seminars and tutorials.  Given in years ending with an even number.  T.E. Massey PREREQUISITE: PHAR-416* or equivalent. Permission of the Graduate Program required.  EXCLUSION: PHAR-815*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Mechanistic Toxicology
